Package controller

Class HyperController

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
controller.HyperController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class HyperController
extends java.lang.Thread
Hypergraph controller that runs the distributed multi-threaded algorithm.
